name: Siege Engineer
text: You are proficient with all siege weaponry.
prerequisites: Knowledge (engineering) 5 ranks or Profession (siege engineer) 5 ranks, proficiency with one siege engine.
benefit: You are considered to be proficient with all siege weapons. Also, when you are crew lead for a siege engine, you do not generate mishaps on the roll of a natural 1.
normal: Each siege engine is an exotic weapon.
staminaText: As long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool, you gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls with all siege weapons.
text_zh: 你对所有攻城兵器了如指掌。
prerequisites_zh: 知识（工程）5级或专业（攻城技师）5级，熟悉一项攻城兵器。
benefit_zh: 你被视为擅长所有攻城兵器。同时，当你身为攻城兵器的机师长时，该兵器不会因攻击投骰为1而掉链。
normal_zh: 每种攻城兵器都是异种武器。
staminaText_zh: 只要你的耐力池中还有至少1点耐力，你就能在所有攻城武器的攻击骰上获得+1加值。
